actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations.

actions.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

official_title: To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act to provide for the payment of rewards for information regarding acts of international terrorism in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to remove a condition that requires rewards for information regarding acts of international terrorism to be for acts committed primarily outside the territorial jurisdiction of the United States.

titles.title: To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act to provide for the payment of rewards for information regarding acts of international terrorism in the United States.
